pages.text: There are other tier 2 energy generators besides the thermal generator and solar panels. Their usability is limited though, since they usually require fuel not too easily obtained.
Technically tier 1, but cannot be used without e.g. sodium from electrolyzing clay dust.
In the rolling machine, sandwich 3 magnesium dust between 6 aluminium ingots. Magnesium dust can be obtained from electrolyzing peridot dust.
Works better if higher up. Can also be obtained via assembly machine with a generator and one magnalium plate.
To get rid of your hydrogen.
Tier 1 but unusable without a tier 3 distillation machine, since we cannot acquire diesel otherwise.
